BR_text.BRdescription:
load_validation_data doesn't actually do anything.
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tiny-dnn/tiny-dnn/blob/master/examples/caffe_converter/caffe_converter.cpp#L82>https://github.com/tiny-dnn/tiny-dnn/blob/master/examples/caffe_converter/caffe_converter.cpp#L82</denchmark-link>
 
 and it seems like it's never done anything since it was created:
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tiny-dnn/tiny-dnn/commit/dc517eeb52dd61f54e171f3ad7ac2a32b9fa0c03#diff-f7cc8b0f12f719aac419390b58e1217fR119>dc517ee#diff-f7cc8b0f12f719aac419390b58e1217fR119</denchmark-link>

comments_1.comment_text:
Something went wrong from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tiny-dnn/tiny-dnn/pull/154>#154</denchmark-link>
 . validation.size() is always 1, so outer for-loop is meaningless... I will fix it. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tomjaguarpaw>@tomjaguarpaw</denchmark-link>
  Thank you for your reporting :)
